seg-source.mrk: How does it work?

target.mrk: Comment cela fonctionne-t-il ?

trans-unit.source: uses a client server architecture based on a centralized (ADE) database (see Figure).

seg-source.mrk: uses a client server architecture based on a centralized (ADE) database (see Figure).

target.mrk: Le utilise une architecture client-serveur basée sur une base de données centralisée du (ADE) (see Figure).

alt-trans.seg-source: uses a client server architecture based on a centralized (ADE) database.
alt-trans.target: <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_doc" style="font-weight: normal;" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> utilise une architecture client-serveur basée sur une base de données centralisée <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (ADE) .

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> in a client-server architecture

target.mrk: Le <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductNameHSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> dans une architecture client-serveur

seg-source.mrk: Server component

target.mrk: Composants du serveur

trans-unit.source: The server component consists of the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and stream files. <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is composed of a database that keeps track of all the data blocks stored, and the repository where data is actually stored. The database should be installed on a fast access disk as it is constantly queried by clients. A Solid State Drive (i.e., SSD) is highly recommended, and is mandatory for <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T15:03:06.6418469+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Hyperlink to Sizing Guide in the User Group" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T15:03:33.3340484+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">large configurations</MadCap:annotation>. The repository should be located on a volume with plenty of available disk space.

seg-source.mrk: The server component consists of the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and stream files.

<MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is composed of a database that keeps track of all the data blocks stored, and the repository where data is actually stored.
The database should be installed on a fast access disk as it is constantly queried by clients.

A Solid State Drive (i.e., SSD) is highly recommended, and is mandatory for <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T15:03:06.6418469+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Hyperlink to Sizing Guide in the User Group" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T15:03:33.3340484+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">large configurations</MadCap:annotation>.
The repository should be located on a volume with plenty of available disk space.

target.mrk: Le serveur se compose du <MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et des fichiers de flux.

L'<MadCap:variable name="HSS.ade" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> contient la base de données qui répertorie les blocs de données conservés, et un ou plusieurs répertoires de stockage où sont conservés les blocs et les métadonnées associées.
La base de données doit être installée sur un disque à accès rapide car elle est fréquemment interrogée par les clients.

Atempo recommande l’utilisation d’un disque SSD, c'est-à-dire, Solid State Drive, et il est même obligatoire pour les <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2020-06-12T15:03:06.6418469+02:00" MadCap:creator="tychom" MadCap:initials="TY" MadCap:comment="Hyperlink to Sizing Guide in the User Group" MadCap:editor="tychom" MadCap:editDate="2020-06-12T15:03:33.3340484+02:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">configurations importantes</MadCap:annotation>.
Le répertoire de stockage doit être situé dans un volume comportant une grande quantité d’espace disponible.

trans-unit.source: The server listens to any incoming request from authorized clients and stores:

seg-source.mrk: The server listens to any incoming request from authorized clients and stores:

target.mrk: Le serveur écoute les requêtes entrantes des clients autorisés et conserve :

seg-source.mrk: Block digests

target.mrk: Les signatures des blocs.

trans-unit.source: The digest is a unique signature identifying a block content. The digest is used to compare blocks and decide whether a block is new or already exists in the repository.

seg-source.mrk: The digest is a unique signature identifying a block content.
The digest is used to compare blocks and decide whether a block is new or already exists in the repository.

target.mrk: La signature de bloc permet d’identifier le contenu du bloc.
Cette signature sert à comparer les blocs pour déterminer si un bloc est nouveau ou bien s’il est déjà stocké.

seg-source.mrk: Data blocks

target.mrk: Les blocs de données.

trans-unit.source: Stored blocks are unique that are sent by clients only if they do not already exist in the repository.

seg-source.mrk: Stored blocks are unique that are sent by clients only if they do not already exist in the repository.

target.mrk: Les blocs conservés sont tous des blocs uniques envoyés par les clients uniquement s’ils n’existent pas déjà dans le répertoire de stockage.

seg-source.mrk: Stream files

target.mrk: Les fichier de flux.

trans-unit.source: A stream file contains the digests from all the blocks in a single backup stream. Even the blocks that are not sent by the client because they already exist, are stored in the stream file. The stream file reflects the original backup stream contents and is used for restore purposes. There is one stream file per <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backup job.

seg-source.mrk: A stream file contains the digests from all the blocks in a single backup stream.
Even the blocks that are not sent by the client because they already exist, are stored in the stream file.
The stream file reflects the original backup stream contents and is used for restore purposes.
There is one stream file per <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> backup job.

target.mrk: Un fichier de flux contient les signatures de tous les blocs appartenant à un même flux de sauvegarde.
Même les signatures des blocs non transférés parce que déjà présents sont incluses dans le fichier de flux.
Le fichier de flux reflète le contenu d’origine du flux de sauvegarde et permet d’effectuer des restaurations.
Un fichier de flux correspond à un travail de sauvegarde <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: The stream file also contains metadata, OS and SIDF type metadata as well as name, type, beginning and end of file information. The size of a stream file is approximately 1% of the backup job size.

seg-source.mrk: The stream file also contains metadata, OS and SIDF type metadata as well as name, type, beginning and end of file information.
The size of a stream file is approximately 1% of the backup job size.

target.mrk: Les fichiers de flux contiennent également des métadonnées de type système de fichiers et SIDF, mais aussi concernant le nom, le type, le début et la fin des fichiers.
La taille d’un fichier de flux est approximativement égale à 1% de la taille du travail de sauvegarde.

seg-source.mrk: Client component

target.mrk: Composant Client

trans-unit.source: The client component or <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent is connected to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and responsible for sending data to the server. The client:

seg-source.mrk: The client component or <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent is connected to the <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and responsible for sending data to the server.
The client:

target.mrk: Le composant client ou un agent <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> se connecte au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> et est responsable de l’envoi des données vers le serveur.
Le client :

alt-trans.seg-source: The client component or <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent is connected to the<MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and responsible for sending data to the server.
alt-trans.target: Le composant client ou un agent <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, se connecte au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, et est responsable de l’envoi des données vers le serveur.

alt-trans.seg-source: The client component or <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent is connected to the<MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> and responsible for sending data to the server.
alt-trans.target: Le composant client ou un agent <MadCap:variable name="HSS.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, se connecte au <MadCap:variable name="HSS.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, et est responsable de l’envoi des données vers le serveur.

trans-unit.source: Segments the backup streams into variable block size of up to 256 KB.

seg-source.mrk: Segments the backup streams into variable block size of up to 256 KB.

target.mrk: Segmente le flux de sauvegarde en blocs de taille variable de 256 Ko maximum.

trans-unit.source: Computes a digest for each block and queries the server to find out if the block is already present in the repository.

seg-source.mrk: Computes a digest for each block and queries the server to find out if the block is already present in the repository.

target.mrk: Calcule la signature des blocs et interroge le serveur pour voir si le bloc existe déjà.

trans-unit.source: Sends new blocks, digests and associated metadata to the server. All digests and metadata for a single backup stream are kept in one stream file.

seg-source.mrk: Sends new blocks, digests and associated metadata to the server.
All digests and metadata for a single backup stream are kept in one stream file.

target.mrk: Envoie au serveur les nouveaux blocs, les signatures et les métadonnées associées.
Les signatures et métadonnées d’un flux de sauvegarde sont conservées dans le même fichier de flux.
